thread.title: Battersea Dogs' and Cats Home host purrfect Valentine's date night
thread.title_full: Battersea Dogs' and Cats Home host purrfect Valentine's date night | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Battersea Dogs' and Cats Home host purrfect Valentine's date night
text:
Battersea Cats and Dogs home are hosting a matchmaking event for anyone who's feline lonely this Valentines day.
Credit: Mayhew Animal Home The matchmaking event - taking place on 14 February - aims to pair up abandoned cats with new owners.
As well as finding a new pet, customers will also be greeted with a glass of bubbly and can enjoy a cat quiz and a poetry corner.
Last updated Sun 5 Feb 2017 London
